About Me

Let me tell you a few things...

BIO

Greetings! I'm Prerna Alave, a proactive and dedicated student eager to embark on a rewarding professional journey. As a recent graduate with a strong foundation in Computer Science, I am excited to channel my skills and knowledge into making meaningful contributions to an innovative organization.

Educational Background

Graduated from Department of Technology Shivaji University Kolhapur with a B.Tech degree in Computer Science and Technology .

Professional Experience

I've had the privilege of working with Softron & Webisoftech, where I was working as Intern & Designer respectively. During my time there, I gained extensive knowledge in HTML, CSS, Bootstrap & MySQL.

Passionate for

My enthusiasm as a Developer goes beyond the nine-to-five. I'm always exploring new trends, tools, and methodologies to stay ahead in the game.

Jr. Java Full Stack Developer

Recent graduate skilled in Java, Spring Boot, Angular, and MySQL, with hands-on experience in full-stack development and collaborative project work.

Asp.Net Core(MVC)

Recent graduate with a passion for ASP.NET Core MVC development, bringing strong problem-solving skills and a commitment to delivering high-quality solutions.

Japanese Language Proficiency

Completed studies in Japanese language, achieving proficiency at the N4 level. Excited about applying language skills in cross-cultural collaborations.
